title: Make Purchase with Grant Funds
description: A PI wants to purchase a piece of lab equipment using their grant funds.

tasks.description: Identify the PI, the grant account, and the details of the purchase (item, cost, vendor).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary purchasing information.

tasks.description: Verify that the purchase is allowable under the terms of the grant and that sufficient funds are available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the equipment is an allowable expense and the grant has enough funds.

tasks.description: Submit a purchase requisition through the university's procurement system, charging it to the grant account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the purchase order.
